#summary using the peaberry bundle with a Maven2 project
#labels Phase-Deploy

Early releases of peaberry can be found on the OPS4J Maven repository:

{{{
  <repositories>
    <repository>
      <id>ops4j.releases</id>
      <url>http://repository.ops4j.org/maven2/</url>
      <snapshots>
        <enabled>false</enabled>
      </snapshots>
    </repository>
  </repositories>
}}}

To add the peaberry bundle to the classpath of your current project, use:

{{{
  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.ops4j</groupId>
      <artifactId>peaberry</artifactId>
      <version>0.3</version>
      <scope>provided</scope>
    </dependency>
  </dependencies>
}}}

An example Maven2 project can be found [http://peaberry.googlecode.com/files/peaberry-0.3-logdemo.zip here].
